Thank you for meeting with us!
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
Thank you for contacting Direct Energy Solar and for your interest in going solar. We hope to have the opportunity to help Direct Energy customers like you save even more money on electricity by switching to solar.
You have qualified for a 6-month Heating & Cooling Repair Essentials Plan from Direct Energy
At Direct Energy Solar, providing our customers with peace of mind is important to us—from our going solar process to our warranties and guarantees. As a part of the Direct Energy family, we are proud to offer you even further peace of mind with a special offer from Direct Energy Protection Plans.
As a thank you for contacting Direct Energy Solar, you have qualified for a Free* 6-month Heating & Cooling Repair Essentials Plan. This plan provides worry-free coverage for inconvenient repairs.
You will be soon be receiving by mail, if you have not already, a welcome kit from Direct Energy Protection Plans that includes coverage and other details about your plan. Please enjoy this special offer, with our compliments.
Your 6-month Plan Includes:
• No service visit charge, no deductibles, no age restrictions • $500 coverage per repair incident up to $2,000 annually • 24/7 emergency service
If you have any questions about your Heating & Cooling Repair Essentials Plan, please contact Direct Energy at 855-334-3577 or visit www.directenergyprotects.com/repair <http://www.directenergyprotects.com/repair>
Contact Us: 800-903-6130 Your Sun. Your Power. Your Way.
You’re receiving this email because you’ve expressed interest in a Direct Energy Solar system installation.
*Contact Direct Energy Solar via the phone number provided on website between June 2, 2015–July 31, 2015 and receive a free 6-month trial of our Heating & Cooling Repair Essentials Plan. No extensions will be granted. The Direct Energy Heating & Cooling Repair Essentials Plan (the “Plan”) is provided by Home Warranty of America, Inc., a Direct Energy company. Not available in all states. There is a 30-day waiting period before coverage begins (giving you 5 months of coverage). The Plan is only free for the initial term of 6 months. Plan value is $101.94 ($16.99 per month for 6 months). Terms and conditions apply. Supplies are limited. Offer not valid with any other promotions, discounts, or special community pricing programs. Only one offer per household.
Offers and financing are not available in all areas. We customize our solar power system specifically for your home, therefore, pricing, savings, utility bill, solar bill amounts and actual returns vary based on different factors including but not limited to your location, system size, available solar incentives and local utility rates. See terms and conditions for more details.
